remarks: Lattice absorption law.  From definition of lattice in [Kalmbach] p. 14.  ( ~ chabs1 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.)
statement:
latabs1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latabs1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latabs1.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latabs1 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .\/ ( X ./\ Y ) ) = X ) $.
